price: (6) O mankind, indeed you are laboring toward your Lord with [great] exertion[1891] and will meet it.[1892]
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ إِنَّكَ كَادِحٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَدۡحٗا فَمُلَٰقِيهِ
footnotes:
[1891]- i.e., striving throughout your life until you meet your Lord, hastening toward death.
[1892]- i.e., you will find all that you intended and accomplished awaiting you in the Hereafter. Another meaning is "And will meet Him [i.e., your Lord]" and be recompensed in full by Him.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-insānu innaka kādiḥun ilā rabbika kadḥan famulāqīhi
